metadata.name: The Love of Life
metadata.description:
This is my first NFT in a collection of 10 photos that were released as a single unique edition.
 
 Photo: 960 Ã— 1280 pix.

  The most amazing thing about this photo is the image of a young girl at the beginning of her journey as a person.

  Youth is a difficult stage in which one has to face many difficulties, which sometimes one cannot cope with when one is that age. Youth is a special period when a person's worldview is formed, his views on the world and the events taking place.
When we are young, we meet many people, we test ourselves, we try to conquer new heights, to achieve success. However, not everything happens as smoothly as it may seem to many at first glance.
School does not provide the universal practical knowledge that life provides. 

Youth flies by unnoticed, and only when you look back do you realize how many difficulties you had to go through to achieve something in life.
